definition: Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤[Pu3 xian2]/Emeishan city
lofty/name of a mountain
eyebrow/upper margin
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Emeishan county level city in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

sentences.english: Maybe I'm going to Mount Emei next vacation. but I'm not sure.
sentences.chinese: 或許我可以在下個假期去峨眉山，但我不會去。
然後我們去爬了峨眉山。

sentences.english: Tourists coming to Leshan & Emeishan Scenic Areas will have no worries about transportation.
sentences.chinese: 到樂山和峨眉山風景區的遊客無須擔心交通的問題。

sentences.english: He told me that he would go to Mount Emei for holidays.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我說他要去峨眉山度假。

sentences.english: Emei Mountain Halfmoon wheels fall into shadow water level Qiang Jiang.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山月半輪秋影入江水位強。

sentences.english: She says she has never been to Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 她說她從來沒有去過峨眉山。

sentences.english: You can tell me more about Mount Emei later.
sentences.chinese: 以後你可以告訴我更多有關峨眉山的事情。

sentences.english: When we climbed to the peak of mountain.
sentences.chinese: 當我們最終登臨峨眉山頂。

sentences.english: Tourists coming to Leshan &Emeishan Scenic Areas will have no worries about transportation.
sentences.chinese: 到樂山和峨眉山風景區的遊客無須擔心交通的問題。

sentences.english: We came back from Mount Emei in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我們晚上才從峨眉山回來。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution of genus Asarum in Mt. Emei of China in relation to systematics.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山細辛屬的分佈及其與系統分類的關係。

sentences.english: The basement of Baihetan Hydropower Plant is the Emei Mountain Basalt.
sentences.chinese: 擬建的白鶴灘水電站的壩基爲峨眉山玄武岩。

sentences.english: A phytogeographical study on the flora of Mount Omei.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山植物區系的初步研究。

sentences.english: Emeishan is one of the four most sacred Buddhist Mountains in China.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山是中國四大佛教名山之一。

sentences.english: Emei Shan took on a fairytale beauty.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山有着童話般的美麗。

sentences.english: Mount Emei is among the four mountains held sacred by Buddhists in China.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山是中國四大佛教名山之一。

definition: Mount Qingcheng

Emei township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan
Wudang Mountain range in northwest Hubei
Mt Jiuhua in Anhui, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Kṣitigarbha 地藏
Mt Taibai in Shaanxi
Lushan district of Jiujiang city 九江市, Jiangxi/Mt Lushan in Jiujiang, famous as summer holiday spot
Mt Hua in Shaanxi, western mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
Leshan prefecture-level city in Sichuan
Dujiangyan in Sichuan, a famous water engineering project and World Heritage Site/Dujiangyan county level city in Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1], Sichuan
Mt Luofushan in Zengcheng county, Guangdong
Jiuzhaigou Valley, Sichuan/Jiuzhaigou county, Sichuan
Mt Longmen, the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin, an active geological fault line/Mt Longmen in Shandong/Mt Longmen in Henan
Mt Huang/Yellow mountains/Huangshan prefecture-level city centered around Huangshan Mountains in south Anhui
Mt Wutai in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1], one of the Four Sacred Mountains and home of the Bodhimanda of Manjushri 文殊[Wen2 shu1]
